dict.acceptation: 身份；[逻]同一性；个性；[数]恒等（式）；

sent.orig: What is more important, tourists' photography is to accomplish! self-narrative" and! self-identity."
sent.trans: 更重要的是，旅游者拍摄照片更是为了完成“自我叙述”(self-narrative)与“自我认同”(self-identity)。

sent.orig: Our body, gender, soul, identity are all given by God.
sent.trans: 人的身体，性别，灵魂，自我(identity)都是上帝所赐。

sent.orig: We can understand the isomorphous relationship among clan identity, ethnic identity and national identity from genealogies.
sent.trans: 从族谱中，我们领悟到家族认同、民族认同与国家认同这三者之间的同构关系。

sent.orig: Traditional studies of Western philosophy stresses on the issues of personal identity or self-identity.
sent.trans: 传统西方哲学对人的个体研究侧重于人格或自我的同一性问题。

sent.orig: A valid identity range is not available. Check the data type of the identity column.
sent.trans: 没有可用的有效标识范围。请检查标识列的数据类型。
